name: Numbers in range
description: Returns TRUE value for every input number, that is in the specified range, or FALSE value for all other numbers.

controls.caption: Result elements type
controls.name: elementType
controls.description: Usually you may specify "byte" to save memory, if FALSE/TRUE values are 0/1 or other little integers in 0..255 range.

controls.caption: TRUE value in the result
controls.name: trueValue
controls.description: Input numbers inside the range are replaced with this value. Usually 1.0

controls.caption: Add array index to TRUE value
controls.name: addTrueValueToIndex
controls.description: If set, the index in the array (0,1,...) is added to every TRUE value

controls.caption: FALSE value in the result
controls.description: Input numbers outside the range are replaced with this value. Usually 0.0
controls.name: falseValue

controls.caption: Add array index to FALSE value
controls.name: addFalseValueToIndex
controls.description: If set, the index in the array (0,1,...) is added to every FALSE value

controls.name: invert
controls.caption: Invert behaviour
controls.description: If set, the results described above are inverted: value for TRUE is used outside the range, value for FALSE is used inside

controls.name: indexInBlock
controls.caption: First processed column
controls.description: First processed index in every block, 0..blockLength-1

controls.name: lengthInBlock
controls.caption: Number of processed columns
controls.description: Length of processed part in every block; if 0, all array is filled and index above is ignored.

controls.name: replaceColumnRangeInInput
controls.description: Replace the specified columns and return the result; in other case, only processed columns will be returned
controls.caption: Fill the specified columns
